head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, MARGARET A. (PEGGY)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, MARGARET A. (PEGGY)

block.p: WRIGHT-Margaret A. (Peggy) nee Lange, in Wilmington, North Carolina on May 5, 2000, formerly of Syosset, New York. Beloved wife of Dr. Edward J. Wright, loving mother of Martha Wright and David Litaker, Jamie and Allison Wright, Kim and Beth Wright, devoted grandmother of Samuel, Lucas, Christopher, and Benjamin. Donations may be made to the Margaret A. Wright Memorial Fund, St. Matthew's Lutheran Church, 612 South College Road, Wilmington, North Carolina 28403.
